SpinDec2
PX915 group A software development project for HetSys in modelling spinodal decomposition
io.f90
1module io
2
3 use iso_fortran_env
4 use netcdf
5
6 implicit none
7
8contains
9
10 !************************************************************************
16 !************************************************************************
17 !
18 subroutine check(status)
19
20 integer, intent(in) :: status
21
22 if (status /= nf90_noerr) then
23 print *, trim(nf90_strerror(status))
24 stop ""
25 end if
26
27 end subroutine check
28
29 !******************************************************************************
44 !*****************************************************************************
45 !
46 subroutine write_netcdf(c, F_tot, a, Nc, Nx, Ny, Nt, dt, c0, MA, MB, kappa)
47
48 integer, intent(in) :: Nx, Ny, Nt, Nc
49 real(kind=real64), dimension(Nx, Ny, Nt), intent(in) :: c
50 real(kind=real64), dimension(Nt), intent(in) :: f_tot
51 real(kind=real64), dimension(Nc), intent(in) :: a
52 integer, dimension(3) :: size_c
53 integer, dimension(3) :: c_dim_ids
54 integer :: size_F_tot, size_a
55 integer :: F_tot_dim_ids, a_dim_ids
56 integer :: c_var_id, F_tot_var_id, a_var_id
57 character(len=*), dimension(3), parameter :: c_dims = (/"c_x", "c_y", "c_t"/)
58 character(len=*), parameter :: F_tot_dims = "F_t", a_dims = "a_i"
59 character(len=*), parameter :: filename = 'CH_output.nc'
60 real(kind=real64), intent(in) :: dt, ma, mb, kappa, c0
61 integer :: k, file_id
62
63 !define size of arrays
64 size_c = shape(c)
65 size_f_tot = size(f_tot)
66 size_a = size(a)
67
68 !Create the file, overwriting if it exists
69 call check(nf90_create(filename, nf90_clobber, file_id))
70
71 !write in the dimensions for the variables
72 do k = 1, 3
73 call check(nf90_def_dim(file_id, c_dims(k), size_c(k), c_dim_ids(k)))
74 end do
75
76 call check(nf90_def_dim(file_id, f_tot_dims, size_f_tot, f_tot_dim_ids))
77 call check(nf90_def_dim(file_id, a_dims, size_a, a_dim_ids))
78 print *, "Dimensions Written"
79
80 !Define variable type, matching the arrays
81 call check(nf90_def_var(file_id, "c", nf90_double, c_dim_ids, c_var_id))
82 call check(nf90_def_var(file_id, "F_tot", nf90_double, f_tot_dim_ids, f_tot_var_id))
83 call check(nf90_def_var(file_id, "coeffs", nf90_double, a_dim_ids, a_var_id))
84 print *, "Variable types defined"
85
86 ! Setting up meta variables of simulation
87
88 !Time step
89 call check(nf90_put_att(file_id, nf90_global, "dt", dt))
90
91 !Number of time iterations
92 call check(nf90_put_att(file_id, nf90_global, "Nt", nt))
93
94 !Grid size (x)
95 call check(nf90_put_att(file_id, nf90_global, "Nx", nx))
96
97 !Grid size (y)
98 call check(nf90_put_att(file_id, nf90_global, "Ny", ny))
99
100 !Mobility
101 call check(nf90_put_att(file_id, nf90_global, "MA", ma))
102 call check(nf90_put_att(file_id, nf90_global, "MB", mb))
103
104 !gradient term coefficient
105 call check(nf90_put_att(file_id, nf90_global, "kappa", kappa))
106
107 !initial average concentration
108 call check(nf90_put_att(file_id, nf90_global, "c0", c0))
109
110 !Finish defining metadata
111 call check(nf90_enddef(file_id))
112
113 ! Actually write the variables
114 call check(nf90_put_var(file_id, c_var_id, c))
115 call check(nf90_put_var(file_id, f_tot_var_id, f_tot))
116 call check(nf90_put_var(file_id, a_var_id, a))
117
118 !close the file
119 call check(nf90_close(file_id))
120
121 print *, "Sucessfully written netcdf file"
122
123 end subroutine write_netcdf
124
125end module io
